WorkItem.Description:
A DataGrid with an empty but bound data collection, that is Grouped, throws an exception when attempting to create a new Row.
Â 
1. Run application.  Will appear with grouped and sorted data, and pre-populated.
2. Create a new row, just to prove that new row works.
3. New row should group itself.
4. Delete all rows.  (click the selector to the left of the row, and press delete)
5. Create a new row.  Exception is thrown within DataGrid code.
